New Records: Jalen Green scored 22 of his 29 points in the third quarter, a career-high performance.
Alperen Sengun contributed with 26 points and 10 rebounds.
Amen Thompson recorded a double-double with 20 points and 15 rebounds.
Fred VanVleet added 19 points to the Rockets' victory.
Key Match Events: Houston's 21-6 third-quarter run extended their lead to 95-74.
Green scored 11 points and made three 3-pointers during the decisive third quarter.
Washington's 18 turnovers led to 35 Houston points, the most by a Wizards opponent this season.
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets were 6-1 on the road against Eastern Conference opponents before the game.
Jordan Poole and Kyle Kuzma were absent for the Wizards due to injuries.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Wizards' marginally improved 4-10 stretch is challenging with potential prolonged absences.
The game was highlighted by the Rockets' strong third-quarter performance and the Wizards' turnover issues.
